app.name: Tags Into Notices
app.short_description: Application to show notices if tags are present
app.long_description: Application that allows configuring notices to be displayed in the sidebar if some tags are present in the ticket, user, or organization
app.installation_instructions: Configure the tags by adding a JSON-formatted list. Refer to https://abash.space/posts/zd-tags-helper
app.title: Tags Into Notices

parameters.tags: Tag list in JSON format with parameters "name", "style", "description", "link"
parameters.styles: Style list in JSON format with parameters "name", "css"
